summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Discord Activity Equip Detail MVP. All backend APIs working correctly with MongoDB persistence. Frontend loads in browser mode with dev login, equipment slot interactions work perfectly, auto-equip/unequip functionality operational, and Terms/Privacy pages accessible. Integration between frontend and backend working seamlessly.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint returns correct message
Profile upsert and fetch with MongoDB persistence
Individual item equipping with stat updates
Frontend loads in browser mode with dev login
Dev login continues to main Equip Detail UI
Equipment slot clicks filter items in side-panel without overlay collisions
Item equipping updates slot labels and sidebar stats correctly
Share Loadout shows toast notification in browser mode
Terms page loads at /terms with correct content
Privacy page loads at /privacy with correct content
Stats calculation and display working correctly
